import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import CustomerUpdateRequest from 'src/app/models/CustomerUpdateRequest'; @Component({ selector: 'app-update-customer', templateUrl: './update-customer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./update-customer.component.scss'] }) export class UpdateCustomerComponent { customer: CustomerUpdateRequest={} isValid() { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } }
